author: xenonca
long_description:
# Description
Limits the times players can die. Exceeding the limit will cause them to turn into a ghost or ban them.
You can define how many times a player will be able to respawn after dying and whether they will be completely excluded from the game (banned) or just turn into a ghost (has no interact priv).
# Commands
Use `/deaths [<player>]` to check how often you or another player (requires `lim_lives` priv) has died.  
Use `/reset_deaths [<player>]` to reset your own or another palyer's (requires `lim_lives` priv) deaths.
name: limited_lives
short_description: Limits the times players can die.
title: Limited Lives
